channel.title: ICNTSE FEED
channel.description: International Conference on New Trends in Sustainable Energy - PUA - KTH

item.title: 2 Prominent Egyptian Keynote Speakers Added!
item.description: Our prominent Egyptian keynote speakers have been added.

item.title: 12 Prestigious KTH Keynote Speakers Added!
item.description: Our prestigious KTH keynote speakers have been added.

item.title: Swedish Institute Sponsors ICNTSE
item.description: ICNTSE would like to thank the Swedish Institute for contributing to the success of the conference and its sponsorship.

item.title: Exhibitor Registration Available
item.description: The conference would be pleased to accommodate, display and showcase your company/institution/research's exhibitions! Please, register your name, email address and the space you would like to reserve. You will be contacted soon after your registration.

item.title: مؤتمر ICNTSE الآن تحت رعاية وزارة الكهرباء و الطاقة المتجددة
item.description: وزير الكهرباء و الطاقة المتجددة السيد / أ.د.محمد شاكر المرقبي قبل دعوة حضور حفل الإفتتاح و أن المؤتمر سيكون تحت رعاية وزارة الكهرباء و الطاقة المتجددة, مصر

item.title: ICNTSE is now under the auspices of The Ministry of Electricity and Renewable Energy - Egypt
item.description: The Minister of Electricity and Renewable Energy, Dr. Mohamed Shaker El-Markabi, has accepted the invitation to attend the conference's opening ceremony and that the conference would be under the auspices of The Ministry of Electricity and Renewable Energy - Egypt.
